name: Minions of Steel
description:
Launch Special: Claim your Free game at the bottom of the page! Grab the Itch app for easier install: Itch app

Build Status: We will be releasing the most stable development builds being actively worked on by our team. The current dev build version is 0.0017.

It all started with GEENEE Genetically Engineered Engram, Neural Electronic Entity

Constructed from a top secret nano tube extrapolation, and a composite of graphene, GEENEE was formed to be the ultimate proxy warrior. GEENEE would take the place of human warriors, and be perfectly obedient and autonomous in the battle field.

In time, the genetically engineered engrams grew to a threshold that gave GEENEE his own perspective of “things.” These things being his own self informed reason for existence; and that existence didn’t include being ordered around by weak, simple human beings.

The first shots were served by GEENEE, and so were the last...

It was the beginning of never ending war on the earth, as the remaining humans fled into the heavens to rethink AI, and hopefully, survive.

The Aftermath..

With Humanity tracing their way into the unknown, leaving GEENEE and his minions alone on the earth, GEENEE devised a plan to continue his war-ing efforts. Missing the destruction and the carnage, GEENEE in the most vainglorious move, cloned his essence and em-placed it into a modified chassis.

Now, with his new nemesis, GEENEE could continue to practice his ruinous ways. Occasionally, each new nemesis would create another depraved entity from which their wretched and damnable dream of destruction could expand. The earth is now engulfed in endless conflict, all to realize the glory of war.

In Game Features
  • Salvage
  • Ranking System (anti pay to win mechanism - coming soon)
  • Assignable AI behaviors for each minion
  • Build, save and load armies via the Operations Editor (OpEd)
  • Keep growing your armies making them ever stronger and stronger
  • Upgrade/Abilities systems (permanent upgrades to all minions and bases)
  • Enhancement system (temporary enhancements for minions)
  • Gain War Points to enhance player bases and drones

What's in the box?

  • Two playable levels (others coming soon)
  • Operations Editor (where you configure your minions and armies)
  • Behaviors Editor (where you configure how your minions respond)
  • Multiplayer PvP capability (Co-Op coming next)
  • Multiplayer with AI (other AI personalities in development)

In the works:

  • Tournament mode (set up instant tournaments with auto scoring)
  • Co-Op
  • Ranking System (Play to Win mitigation)
  • Better looking Fog of War (FOG)
  • AI personalities
  • Full screen and window modes
  • Tracks in terrain
  • AI polishing
  • 3 more default maps
  • More minion chassis
  • More weapons
  • More effects
